description.value: You immediately learn two of the following rituals: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4Cntq9odgW6xMpAs]{Astral Projection}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gsYEuWv04XTDxe91]{Call Spirit}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.7DN13ILADW2N9Z1t]{Commune}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.7DN13ILADW2N9Z1t]{Commune}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.hp6Q64dl7xbdn4gQ]{Legend Lore}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.2ykmAVKrsAWcazcC]{Planar Binding}. When you perform any ritual, you can incorporate harrow cards into the ritual to gain a +2 status bonus to all skill checks made to resolve the effects of the ritual. You can take this feat more than once; each time you do, you learn two new rituals.
